task.summary: do not bill if signing up for free reseller tier
allow ucc and premium ssl reprocess to change domains and subdomains

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: include amazon as an option for server software

MESSAGE.value: fixed prev button for non registered users by removing sync_aid_li_cart. It was having problems converting AppConfig value to string. Also fixed json login midway through certificate order
notify admin when dup username or email is being used to login or reset credentials
allow user to choose providing billing info when signing up for Tier 1 reseller
do not bill if signing up for free reseller tier
allow ucc and premium ssl reprocess to change domains and subdomains
include amazon as an option for server software
